definitions: (slang) to cheat; to swindle; to trick
(slang) to not show up at a date; to jilt; to stand up
(transitive, familiar, southern Italy, central Italy) to grope or palpate (especially the buttocks)
(intransitive, familiar, southern Italy, central Italy) to make out
synonyms: tirare un bidone; see also Thesaurus:ingannare
